mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY
INSERT INTO tb_question ( sid, title, description, views, answers, is_privacy, is_legal, sortt, remark, del_flag, split_db_key, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, versionn ) values( #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{answers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isPrivacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLegal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitDbKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT @@IDENTITY
INSERT INTO tb_question ( sid, title, description, views, answers, is_privacy, is_legal, sortt, remark, del_flag, split_db_key, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, versionn ) values
( #{item.sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.views,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.answers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isPrivacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isLegal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.splitDbKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_question
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
views = #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT},
answers = #{answers,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_privacy = #{isPrivacy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_legal = #{isLegal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortt = #{sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
versionn = #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
